audioText: Ma fille a fait une bonne rentrée à l'école cette année.
question: How did the daughter's school year begin?
options: She had a good start back at school
She struggled with the new schedule
She missed many classes early on
She was nervous about meeting teachers
explanation: The text states 'Ma fille a fait une bonne rentrée à l'école cette année' - My daughter had a good start back at school this year. 'Rentrée' refers to the return to school after vacation, particularly the beginning of the school year.
